hero.subtitle: At CelesteIQ, we combine the strength of the Microsoft ecosystem with the power of Artificial Intelligence to deliver services that truly make an impact.

cta.text: Our packages, audits, and specialized solutions accompany you from strategy to implementation—helping you build a more efficient, connected, and future-ready company.

intro.body1: At CelesteIQ, we understand that every company has a different starting point in its digital transformation journey. That's why we've designed intelligent packages that integrate the tools of the Microsoft ecosystem with applied Artificial Intelligence capabilities — helping you move forward with speed, security, and clarity.
intro.body2: Our goal: to make technology work for you — not the other way around.

bullets.evolutionDesc: Scalable solutions that grow with you

pack1.title: IT Administrator Pack
pack1.description: Keep your Microsoft 365 environment always optimized, secure, and under control. With the Intelligent IT Administrator Pack, we combine human supervision and AI-powered automation to detect issues before they affect productivity.

bullets.1: Continuous monitoring of Microsoft 365, Azure, and Teams
bullets.2: Early alerts generated by predictive AI
bullets.4: Remote technical support and advanced administration

pack1.note: Ideal for companies seeking operational stability and technological efficiency without expanding their IT team.

pack2.title: Power Platform Pack
pack2.description: Eliminate repetitive tasks and accelerate your processes with Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI — enhanced with AI. We help you connect your applications, visualize key data, and make faster, data-driven decisions.

bullets.4: Full integration with Microsoft Teams and Dynamics 365

pack2.note: Turn your data into actions and your processes into opportunities.

pack3.title: Modern Workplace Pack
pack3.description: Reinvent collaboration in your company with Microsoft 365, Teams, SharePoint, and Copilot. We create digital environments where your teams can communicate, create, and make better decisions thanks to integrated AI support.

bullets.2: Integration of Copilot and customized virtual assistants

pack3.cta: Speak with a Modern Workplace specialist

cards.copilotPrompt: How can I help you today?

pack4.title: Intelligent Security Pack
pack4.description: Your security should never depend on luck. With this package, we combine the most powerful tools of the Microsoft ecosystem — Defender, Entra ID, Azure Sentinel — with AI algorithms capable of detecting threats in real time.
pack4.note: Protect your data with intelligence, not reaction.

whyPackages.subtitle: We deliver intelligent solutions that transform how you work
whyPackages.noteSubtitle: It is designed, trained, and measured.
whyPackages.ctaExtra: and discover which package best fits your company
